item.title: 10 booked on the charge of child marriage, sexual assault on minor in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Raichur Police on Thursday registered an FIR against 10 people in connection with a case of child marriage and sexual assault on a minor girl.
The FIR, following a complaint lodged by Panchayat Development Officer of Deosugur in Raichur district Ravi Kumar, states that accused No 2 to 10, Gaddemma, Sumangala, Geetha, Anjaneyya, Gaddeppa, Renuka, Sadanand, Mahadevi and Ramanagouda, performed the marriage of Tatappa, who is accused No 1, with the victim, a minor girl, on April 18, 2025, at Sh...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Man, two daughters die of suspected food poisoning in Karnataka's Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[A suspected case of food poisoning in Raichur, Karnataka, has resulted in the deaths of a man and his two daughters, while his wife and two other children have been hospitalised.
The deceased have been identified as 35-year-old Ramesh, his daughters Nagamma, aged 8, and Deepa, aged 6. The family had reportedly consumed a home-cooked meal of cluster bean curry, rotti, rice and sambar on Monday night. Later that night, all six family members complained of severe stomach pain and were rushed to Li...]]>
